name: AI Lead Research Agent - Simple Workflow
description: Beginner-friendly workflow: Apollo List Accounts → OpenAI Scoring → Google Sheets
note: This is a simplified template for beginners. Follow the course instructions to configure each module.

setup_instructions.important: DO NOT import this template directly into Make.com - it's for reference only
setup_instructions.instead: Follow the step-by-step instructions in Lessons 3-5 to build this workflow manually
setup_instructions.why: Building it yourself ensures you understand each step and can troubleshoot issues
modules_to_add: 1. Apollo - List Accounts (returns company data with industry, employee count, etc.)
2. OpenAI - Create a Chat Completion (scores leads using AI)
3. Google Sheets - Add a Row (stores qualified leads)

settings.prompt: See Lesson 4 for the complete prompt template

why_build_manually: Better understanding of how each module works
Easier to troubleshoot when things go wrong
Learn to customize for your specific needs
Avoid import errors and module reference issues
The course provides step-by-step instructions for everything
